page.title: 01MINEHEAD
page.content: Minehead County First School and St.Michaels CofE First School are proud to submit the following information regarding Minehead. The town enjoys both{coastal and {moorland scenery}and this supports its largest industry, tourism.The {population of 8,500 } is often inflated to at the height of the season. For the local children there are 2 {schools}for 5-9s(330) Minehead Middle for 9-13(550)and the West Somerset school for 13-18s(1,100).Many or the older children are bussed in.The WSS has a catchment area of 600 sq.miles. Many people{retire}to Minehead because of its mild climate,sea air and breath taking scenery.
